name: WakaVR
description:
Welcome to the VR game experience that combines the fast-paced action of Beat Saber and the classic arcade-style gameplay of Pac-Man. In this game, you'll step into a neon-infused world, ready to carve your path through each level.

The game features over 20 levels across 3 difficulty's, each with its own unique design. You'll navigate through mazes while battling ghosts.

With intuitive controls and immersive VR technology, this game is perfect for players of all skill levels. Whether you're a seasoned VR gamer or new to the world of virtual reality, you'll find plenty of excitement and challenge in this fast-paced game. Unlock new weapons to use along your journey, and try to stay on top of the leaderboard for every level!
